location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of Samuel Manesty's letter (see f 11 1), which reached him on 9 May 1802. He informs Manesty that before the arrival of that letter he had forwarded the drafts for the amount of 24,000 pisasters [piasters]. Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun responds to Manesty's request for a general statement of the actual final sales of the consignment to Bushire by stating that it cannot be drawn out as there is still a quantity of bales that has yet to be disposed of.
